channel.description: Recent content in üè¢ Purdue University on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: A Unified Debiasing Approach for Vision-Language Models across Modalities and Tasks
item.description: SFID, a novel debiasing method, effectively mitigates bias in vision-language models across various tasks without retraining, improving fairness and efficiency.

item.title: Curvature Clues: Decoding Deep Learning Privacy with Input Loss Curvature
item.description: Deep learning privacy is enhanced by a new membership inference attack using input loss curvature, exceeding existing methods, especially on large datasets.

item.title: ECLipsE: Efficient Compositional Lipschitz Constant Estimation for Deep Neural Networks
item.description: ECLipsE: A novel compositional approach drastically accelerates Lipschitz constant estimation for deep neural networks, achieving speedups of thousands of times compared to the state-of-the-art while …

item.title: Multiclass Transductive Online Learning
item.description: Unbounded label spaces conquered! New algorithm achieves optimal mistake bounds in multiclass transductive online learning.
